TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Lokot, title = Lokot, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lokot} }

S.FORM: Lokot Sakakaya' sanay ko papah , cecacecay laya' no kamay ko kakaya'. Malalid a romahad i semot, i kilakilangan . Ma'osi to cidal , tatiih ko lengaw ano matalang i cidal. Maolah a lomahad i masoemetay a sata' ato kilang. Kiemel ko lamit nira a mikafit i kilakilangan . Anini, 'aloman to komaenay to lokot, 'aloman 'aloman to ko mipalomaay to lokot i facal, i tatihi no loma', i semot no omaomahan. siiked O sakoengelay a papah nira ko kakaenen no tamdaw. Fangcal ano matangtang anoca maciyan. Roma sato mapolong to katacomoli a masafel. O papah nira, maosoy a mafail, fangcal a masahana . Maolahay a malengaw i lidolidongan, itini i saemelay a sota ko kalengaw no lokot. Ikorto, o harateng no ci todongay to no lotolotokan i, o pipaloma no aniniay a tamdaw i, saheto sa pahiliwan anca o cisawarakay, tongal sato atekakay ko 'aca no lokot. O papah no lokot i mangaay pacamolen to kohaw no foting, ka'esoay kaenen. I tini i,noTaywan i,kasa falifalic no romi'ad, Takaraway a lotlotkan 'edeng ira ko 50~870kongco. Matatorongay a takalaway a lotolotokan400~1200kongco,I tirataatlaway i kilangkilanganamalengaw.
